tasks.build:linux: mkdir -p dist && deno compile --no-check --sloppy-imports --allow-read --allow-write --allow-env --allow-net --exclude=node_modules --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu --output dist/controlpath-linux src/index.ts
tasks.build:macos: mkdir -p dist && deno compile --no-check --sloppy-imports --allow-read --allow-write --allow-env --allow-net --exclude=node_modules --target x86_64-apple-darwin --output dist/controlpath-macos src/index.ts
tasks.build:windows: mkdir -p dist && deno compile --no-check --sloppy-imports --allow-read --allow-write --allow-env --allow-net --exclude=node_modules --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc --output dist/controlpath-windows.exe src/index.ts
tasks.test: deno test --no-check --sloppy-imports --allow-read --allow-write --allow-env src || (echo 'No test files found' && exit 0)
